tables.name: geohub.dataset
tables.comment: this table manages metadata of files

columns.name: url
columns.comment: stores URL for dataset. e.g., URL for azure blob, URL for mosaicjson

tables.name: geohub.tag
tables.comment: this table manages tags

tables.name: geohub.dataset_tag
tables.comment: this table connects file_metadata and tag tables

tables.name: geohub.style
tables.comment: this table manages style.json created at geohub

tables.name: geohub.dataset_favourite
tables.comment: This table manages users to save their favourite datasets

tables.name: geohub.country
tables.comment: This table is to manage country master data

tables.name: geohub.dataset_permission
tables.comment: this table manages users' permission for operating each dataset

tables.name: geohub.superuser
tables.comment: this table manages superusers across geohub app

tables.name: geohub.user_settings
tables.comment: This table stores the user settings for geohub

columns.name: settings
columns.comment: This column stores the settings JSON

tables.name: geohub.users
tables.comment: This table manages the login users information for analysis

columns.name: id
columns.comment: MD5 hash key from user email address

columns.name: signupat
columns.comment: date time when user first time accessed

columns.name: lastaccessedat
columns.comment: date time when user accessed last time

tables.name: geohub.style_favourite
tables.comment: this table is to manage users favourite styles

tables.name: geohub.dataset_defaultstyle
tables.comment: This table is to manage the default layer style for each dataset

columns.name: layer_id
columns.comment: Layer ID. Band name if it is raster, layer ID if it is vector.

columns.name: layer_type
columns.comment: fill, symbol, line, circle, heatmap, raster

columns.name: style
columns.comment: JSON object for maplibre layer style

columns.name: colormap_name
columns.comment: colormap name if it is used

columns.name: classification_method
columns.comment: classification method if it is used

columns.name: classification_method_2
columns.comment: classification method if there are two classification settings (icon size, line width) apart from color.

tables.name: geohub.stac
tables.comment: This table is to manage STAC APIs and Catalogs managed in GeoHub

columns.name: providers
columns.comment: json of array of provider name

tables.name: geohub,style_permission
tables.comment: this table manages users' permission for operating each saved style

tables.name: geohub.product
tables.comment: This is the table that manages the products

columns.name: expression
columns.comment: mathematical expression of the stac products

tables.name: geohub.stac_collection_product
tables.comment: This is the table to manage linking a product to stac collection.

columns.name: assets
columns.comment: List of assets used to generate this produc

tables.name: geohub.storymap
tables.comment: This table manages storymap settings

tables.name: geohub.storymap_chapter
tables.comment: This table manages chapter of storymap

tables.name: geohub.storymap_chapters
tables.comment: This table links storymap to chapters in order.

tables.name: geohub.storymap_favourite
tables.comment: this table is to manage users favourite storymaps

tables.name: geohub.storymap_permission
tables.comment: this table manages users' permission for operating each storymap
